item.title: Summer Reading Kickoff Party
item.description: Saturday, June 03 2023 11:00am - 1:00pm It's finally summer, let's have a party! Join us for facepainting, inflatables, activities and cover band Switch in Time in the parking lot to celebrate the start of summer!

item.title: Operation Wildlife Deluxe Raptor
item.description: Wednesday, June 07 2023 6:30pm - 7:30pm Watch hawks, falcons and owls from the Dayshift and Nightshift programs for five or six raptors. You'll learn about the hunting habits and adaptive characteristics of the birds presented.
